text: Julio Méndez Alemán (November 29, 1933 - April 11, 2012) was a Mexican movie, television, stage, voice, and radio actor.Muere el actor Julio Alemán, víctima de cáncer, a los 79 años Alemán was born in Morelia, Michoacán on November 29, 1933. He was married to Esperanza Martínez. They had six children. Alemán died in Mexico City on April 11, 2012. He had been diagnosed with lung cancer. His remains were cremated and a memorial service was held on April 12, 2012, in Mexico City. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican radio actors Category:People from Michoacán
title: Julio Alemán
